summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. Initially, a cyclist and a scooter rider are visible in the lane ahead. Suddenly, a pedestrian appears from the right side, darting into the vehicles path, causing an emergency situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. Upon the sudden appearance of the pedestrian from the right side, the vehicle needs to decelerate rapidly to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: Cyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving straight ahead. 2) Front: Scooter rider, approximately 15 meters away, moving straight ahead. 3) Right: Pedestrian, approximately 2 meters away, suddenly darting into the vehicles path.
